name: Get a photo from any African country.
Get the first photo of a new tour.
Steal/Get coins from an opponent.
Fly on a plane.
Have 2 train cards at once.
Have 2 helicopter cards at once.
Land on the same space as an opponent.
Fly in a helicopter.
Become a Super Mii and buy a photo.
Don't use any special cards for 4 turns in a row.
Travel the same amount of spaces 3 turns in a row.
Get a photo from any European country.
Buy all 3 cards from a shop.
Have cards that sum up to 20 or more.
Take 2 jobs in consecutive turns.
Win a 1 vs. 3 minigame.
Land on a surprise space.
Get the last photo of the game.
Get paid 10 coins for a job.
Move in a train.
Collect at least 40 coins from minigames.
Get paid less than 5 coins for a job.
Collect 4 photos in total.
Get a photo from any Asian country.
Move more than 7 spaces in one turn.
